#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char inp[100005];
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		scanf("%s", inp);
		int ctr = 1, tot = 0;
		long long int ans = 0;
		map <int,int> M;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			if(inp[i] == 'c')
			{
				ans+=M[tot];
				ctr++;
			}
			else
			{
				M[tot]+=ctr;
				ctr = 0;
				if(inp[i] == 'a')
					tot-=2;
				else
					tot+=3;
				ans+=M[tot];
				ctr++;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
